HOME.CLOSED_UPLOAD_REQUEST_MESSAGE: You cannot perform any action on this upload request
HOME.DRAG_AND_DROP_MESSAGE: Drag and drop your files here to upload them
HOME.CLOSE_UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARNING: You are about to close the upload request. After closing, you will not be able to upload files or perform any actions on uploaded files.
HOME.WELCOME_MESSAGE: You received an upload request from {owner}. The upload request will be active until {expiryDate} or the request closure. Beyond that, you will not be able to upload nor delete files.

PASSWORD.TITLE: Enter your password for the upload request

MESSAGE.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong! Please try again.
MESSAGE.UPLOAD_SUCCESS: The file has been uploaded successfully!
MESSAGE.DELETE_ENTRY_SUCCESS: The entry has been deleted successfully!
MESSAGE.DELETE_ENTRIES_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete {length} entries?
MESSAGE.DELETE_ENTRY_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
